title: Ani ni Tsukeru Kusuri wa Nai!
description: What's your brother like? To Miao, her brother Fen is someone who would tease her and make her explode 100 times a day; not a peaceful day as the two are fighting every single minute. However, when troubles come, Fen will become a caring, loving brother who protects his little sister at all cost.
genre: [<Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> School>, <Genre -> Shoujo>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>]
